DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether low-dose peg-interferon plus ribavirin therapy is effective in the prevention of hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) in patients who had the curative resection of primary HCC.
DOC.brief_title: Low-dose Peg-interferon Plus Ribavirin (IFN/RBV) for Prevention of Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC) Recurrence in Patients Who Had Surgery to Remove Primary HCC
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of Hepatocellular carcinoma due to Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Infection. Must be treated with curative treatment for primary tumor using either surgical resection or radiofrequency ablation therapy No recurrence of hepatocellular carcinoma 3 months after the primary treatment Renal dysfunction
